Comment: I used to think that Wisconsin's Ron Johnson was the dumbest member of the US Senate. But Tommy Tuberville quickly seized that distinction away from ol' Ron.
Author: clamorous_owle

Comment: Easy to find this info. Walton County Fl, property appraiser lists 2 properties in Santa Rosa Beach. Fl for Tuberville and his wife Suzanne. How the fuck is he a rep in Alabama?
